comments.body: side issue,  we have 2 different versions of this error message (the original also happens), so these should be the same (future PR). I don't think we actually need to distinguish them.

We already have both messages in the code (I did not write a new message).

The only difference is that now this case raises the correct one.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@                s.iloc[3.0]
            tm.assert_raises_regex(TypeError,
                                   'Cannot index by location index',
                                   f)
